title: The Cheeky Panda Face Wipes | Coconut Scented Biodegradable Makeup Remover Wipes | Pack of 25 Wet Wipes
features: Sustainable Face Wipes – Our unscented wet wipes are made from FSC approved Bamboo. Lowering your carbon footprint one wipe at a time!
Plant Based Wet Wipes – The Cheeky Panda facial wipes are free from any chemicals and contain only plant-based ingredients. Made from bamboo and 99% purified water, keeping your skin soft and clean!
Vegan Certified – At The Cheeky Panda, our goal is sustainability and ethical consumption. This is why our makeup remover wipes are certified to be Vegan friendly.
Biodegradable Wet Wipes – Our facial wipes are certified to be 100% biodegradable and plastic free. Only the packaging is plastic, and that’s recyclable.
Why Bamboo? – By using Bamboo instead of trees to produce our face cleansing wipes, we are helping keep our forests healthy for future generations to come.
description: Eco-Friendly Bamboo Facial Cleansing Wipes are kind and gentle to skin. The cheeky panda Facial Cleansing wipes are 100% Biodegradable and Compostable using fragrance-free infused 99% Purified Water infused with Aloe Vera and Fruit Extracts wowen to help remove the most stubborn makeup. 100% Pure Bamboo is naturally hypoallergenic, Kind, and soft on the skin. Our natural formula , no contains chlorine, no chemicals, and Cruelty-Free. 100% Plastic Free Product & Packaging. Certified with the Vegan Society. Dermatologically Tested with SGS. Bamboo is a fibrous plant and degrades naturally is the fastest growing plant in the world making it extremely renewable and sustainable. It grows 30 times faster than trees, produces 30% more oxygen, and absorbs 35% more carbon. We source our Bamboo in SE China because there’s so much of it! Bamboo grows wildly on vast mountains, and most of the harvested stuff goes to waste until we came along! Don’t worry, it’s not the same Bamboo the pandas chomp on! We balance the carbon emitted in our process with The World Land Trust to rebuild rainforests in Vietnam and protect animal habitats, to emit any excess carbon nasties into our glorious environment. We make a real impact with our Earth, Ocean, and People initiative We're supporting The World Land Trust, Whale and Dolphin Conservation, and Toilet Twinning. Why? Because they are on a mission to create a happier planet.
